I cant get this to install.
When I run it it keeps trying to install Adobe 10.2. The Adobe thing then says this is not the newest ver of Adobe then the installation terminates.

I suggest to you to unistall your adobe flash player software from your computer and all its registry (using ccleaner or whatever you want) and now try to reinstall the product. Your computer need to be 'clean' from any other newest adobe flash player files because oldest version will say 'you have installed a newest version' or 'this version is oldest than the version installed on your pc'... it works depends what operating system you use..... i repeat the setup it's the original one from nero website.... in fact, a few days ago i re-install operating system on my laptop (windows 7 ultimate) and i install thie version of nero because i saw bad comments here... for me worked very well (and i don't have flash player installed on it, and nero need it), no flash player install error or something appeared... i tested it on windows 7 home premium (on my pc) and ultimate (on my laptop) and worked... but on a another computer with windows 7 it say error when trying to install flash player 10 because the version old now, i recommend to you if you see this to remove all flash player installed on your pc and also remove all registry entires about adobe, and try to reinstall nero... it must working now..
